LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: It might be a miracle that we were still alive despite all the damage to the ship.

LABEL: 0x330
STRING: The staircase was somewhat cool despite the air conditioning working since before the accident.

LABEL: 0x380
STRING: The sound of our irregular footsteps reminded me more of the movement of mollusks than arthropods.

LABEL: 0x3C4
STRING: And at the source of said footsteps was Reiri, who was walking onward in silence.

LABEL: 0x3FA
STRING: The way Reiri walked without looking back at all was calm in its own way.

LABEL: 0x44C
STRING: As I stared at her small back, I broke out in a cold sweat.

LABEL: 0x4FD
STRING: No, let's not try to hide it.

LABEL: 0x525
STRING: It wasn't just Reiri's condition that worried me.

LABEL: 0x64B
STRING: 「I... was investigating, of course.」

LABEL: 0x677
STRING: 「About the cause of this "incident."」

LABEL: 0x71F
STRING: I didn't know how close she was to the heart of the matter, but she at least seemed to know something.

LABEL: 0x77B
STRING: And just a moment ago, she had said something threatening to me in front of everyone.

LABEL: 0x7C7
STRING: I had followed her, trying to figure out her true intentions, but...

LABEL: 0x813
STRING: The girl still showed no signs of opening her mouth.

LABEL: 0x849
STRING: I felt like she was giving me the cold shoulder, but I couldn't let my guard down.

LABEL: 0x8F8
STRING: I had no idea what she was thinking with her back turned to me.

LABEL: 0x93C
STRING: Maybe she didn't care who I was or what I had done.

LABEL: 0x994
STRING: Or was this a trap?

LABEL: 0x9B8
STRING: Maybe she was waiting for me to do something or let my guard down...

LABEL: 0xA0A
STRING: Wouldn't that be plausible?

LABEL: 0xA38
STRING: I knew I was being paranoid, but I couldn't stop getting increasingly suspicious.

LABEL: 0xA90
STRING: Or――

LABEL: 0xAAA
STRING: Maybe――

LABEL: 0xADC
STRING: ...Or maybe Reiri just wanted her medicine from the crew room.

LABEL: 0xB36
STRING: Her small back was in front of me.

LABEL: 0xB56
STRING: I remembered how light she was when I'd carried her just half a day ago.

LABEL: 0xBFF
STRING: It was almost like she was an empty vessel or a doll trying to keep up appearances.

LABEL: 0xC3D
STRING: It was a symbol of weakness.

LABEL: 0xC61
STRING: Wasn't that sarcastic speech earlier just her way of putting on a brave face?

LABEL: 0xCA9
STRING: Or did she actually have a shady side to her?

LABEL: 0xCF1
STRING: She was Touri's twin sister...

LABEL: 0xD17
STRING: Not some mysterious monster.

LABEL: 0xD4B
STRING: Don't lose sight of what she really is.

LABEL: 0xD81
STRING: Her frail limbs made it look like she might collapse at any moment.

LABEL: 0xDB9
STRING: If this wasn't her true nature, then what...?

LABEL: 0xEF9
STRING: We circled around the spiral staircase and descended to the second floor.

LABEL: 0xF3D
STRING: Despite the trip taking twice as long as usual, I still couldn't clear my head.

LABEL: 0xF93
STRING: My thoughts were at a dead end.

LABEL: 0xFAF
STRING: Maybe that was why my shoulders felt so heavy despite the exercise.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: Reiri had reached the bottom of the staircase and stood stock-still, out of breath.

LABEL: 0x10BC
STRING: I unconsciously held out my hand but pulled it back after remembering her exchange with Touri earlier.

LABEL: 0x112C
STRING: It wouldn't do any good to hurt her pride by offering help...

LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: I was starting to show my own weakness after seeing how sickly she was.

LABEL: 0x11C0
STRING: "She was to be pitied."

LABEL: 0x11E6
STRING: I waited until Reiri had caught her breath before I opened my mouth.

LABEL: 0x1226
STRING: 「Will the medicine help you?」

LABEL: 0x12C2
STRING: 「What are you getting at?」

LABEL: 0x12DF
STRING: 「What am I getting at...」

LABEL: 0x1317
STRING: I was just asking.

LABEL: 0x133B
STRING: I looked at Reiri again.

LABEL: 0x13C0
STRING: She was no longer breathing erratically, but her cheeks still had a faint reddish tinge.

LABEL: 0x141A
STRING: She was this exhausted from just going down the stairs. What was up with her?

LABEL: 0x146E
STRING: And, as if those thoughts had shown on my face, Reiri's lips curled slightly, causing me to avert my eyes.

LABEL: 0x14BE
STRING: 「No... I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x14EF
STRING: 「For what?」

LABEL: 0x150C
STRING: 「Well... It must be hard for you to talk about it.」

LABEL: 0x153C
STRING: 「I get that you don't want any special treatment.」

LABEL: 0x1580
STRING: 「It must be unpleasant to be constantly reminded of your own weak body.」

LABEL: 0x15C2
STRING: 「So... I apologize for being insensitive.」

LABEL: 0x1673
STRING: Reiri remained silent.

LABEL: 0x1695
STRING: She was staring straight at me without saying a word.

LABEL: 0x16CF
STRING: I couldn't understand the meaning behind her gaze.

LABEL: 0x1703
STRING: I locked eyes with her for a few seconds as I tried to figure her out,

LABEL: 0x1753
STRING: but eventually looked away awkwardly and started walking.

LABEL: 0x17A0
STRING: 「Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x17BB
STRING: A voice called out from behind me.

LABEL: 0x17DD
STRING: A hoarse voice.

LABEL: 0x1865
STRING: 「Just where are you going?」

LABEL: 0x188C
STRING: 「Where...?」

LABEL: 0x18AA
STRING: 「Aren't we going to the crew room to get your medicine――」

LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: 「I already have it.」

LABEL: 0x196F
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x1994
STRING: 「Here, look.」

LABEL: 0x19D1
STRING: Reiri pulled a small transparent bag out of her pocket while talking in a whispering voice.

LABEL: 0x1A1F
STRING: I could see several medical ampules inside.

LABEL: 0x1A59
STRING: Now I was no doctor, so I couldn't tell for sure, but they looked the same as the ones Touri had been carrying.

LABEL: 0x1AC1
STRING: So...

LABEL: 0x1AD9
STRING: That meant...

LABEL: 0x1AF9
STRING: There was no need to get the medicine in the first place?

LABEL: 0x1B29
STRING: Then, why did she want to go back to the crew room?

LABEL: 0x1B65
STRING: Did Reiri mean to do something nefarious to me after all――

LABEL: 0x1C05
STRING: 「Where I want to go to is the laboratory.」

LABEL: 0x1C2C
STRING: She said it like it was the most natural thing in the world.

LABEL: 0x1C6C
STRING: I had no reply ready for that.

LABEL: 0x1CCA
STRING: 「The laboratory...?」

LABEL: 0x1CF7
STRING: 「Don't you know where it is?」

LABEL: 0x1D1F
STRING: 「If you want, I can show you the way.」

LABEL: 0x1DAA
STRING: 「Oh, and don't worry about those guys up there.」

LABEL: 0x1DE6
STRING: 「There should be a mountain of things to do back there.」

LABEL: 0x1E24
STRING: 「They won't be coming this way.」

LABEL: 0x1EB5
STRING: 「And if they get suspicious, let's see... You can just say that it took a while to find my medicine.」

LABEL: 0x1F0F
STRING: 「Or, you can say that I collapsed. I don't care either way――」

LABEL: 0x1F70
STRING: 「W-Wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x1F94
STRING: Reiri spoke eloquently.

LABEL: 0x1FB2
STRING: I hurriedly stopped her.

LABEL: 0x1FF0
STRING: What the hell was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x201E
STRING: She told me she already had the medicine we came to get,

LABEL: 0x2056
STRING: and now she wanted to go to the lab?

LABEL: 0x207C
STRING: What was she trying to do?

LABEL: 0x20A0
STRING: I had absolutely no idea what was going on.

LABEL: 0x20C6
STRING: But I wasn't angry or confused.

LABEL: 0x20F4
STRING: I just glared at the girl in front of me.

LABEL: 0x2187
STRING: With a thin, fake smile on her face,

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: while not flinching in the slightest,

LABEL: 0x21E3
STRING: Reiri remained silent.

LABEL: 0x21FF
STRING: 「...What do you mean, you had the medicine?」

LABEL: 0x22A1
STRING: 「Are you going to call me a liar?」

LABEL: 0x22CD
STRING: 「You, of all people?」

LABEL: 0x22FA
STRING: Reiri looked amused.

LABEL: 0x2322
STRING: Her smile was hateful, but I couldn't say anything back.

LABEL: 0x236C
STRING: 「...I couldn't help it.」

LABEL: 0x23A1
STRING: 「It's the same for me.」

LABEL: 0x23C3
STRING: 「I had no choice but to lie.」

LABEL: 0x23E9
STRING: 「I "couldn't help it."」

LABEL: 0x2430
STRING: She responded to me with plenty of composure.

LABEL: 0x2458
STRING: I didn't know high school girls these days were such cunning creatures.

LABEL: 0x2498
STRING: She repeated my own words back to me theatrically as if to tease me.

LABEL: 0x24D8
STRING: She was toying with me.

LABEL: 0x2580
STRING: 「Is there anything else?」

LABEL: 0x25A3
STRING: 「...It's locked.」

LABEL: 0x25E2
STRING: 「Well, if we have the key, we can just unlock it.」

LABEL: 0x260A
STRING: 「That's why I brought you along, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x2637
STRING: And how would you know that?

LABEL: 0x2657
STRING: That I had the key, and...

LABEL: 0x2681
STRING: How did she know my name in the first place?

LABEL: 0x26C3
STRING: She might have been able to learn Yukari's, Hiragino's, and Tokiwa's names just by looking at the passenger list,

LABEL: 0x270D
STRING: but where did she learn my real name,

LABEL: 0x274F
STRING: which was registered there as лл?

LABEL: 0x2779
STRING: However, this was no longer a situation where I could ask her about it.

LABEL: 0x27B1
STRING: Reiri looked triumphant.

LABEL: 0x27D5
STRING: I closed my mouth in front of her arrogant demeanor, which made her look all-knowing and all-capable.

LABEL: 0x288D
STRING: 「Okay, shall we go then?」

LABEL: 0x2938
STRING: 「You seem dissatisfied, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x295C
STRING: 「Manipulating your surroundings one-sidedly and heavy-handedly...」

LABEL: 0x2984
STRING: 「It feels good, doesn't it?」

LABEL: 0x29BB
STRING: 「...Is that how you do things, manipulating others?」

LABEL: 0x29FD
STRING: It was the grumblings of a loser.

LABEL: 0x2A1B
STRING: Just some nonsense I spat out in desperation.

LABEL: 0x2A5D
STRING: However, I might have been more on the mark than I thought.

LABEL: 0x2A91
STRING: Using your own weakness as a shield to manipulate your surroundings...

LABEL: 0x2AC9
STRING: She must have no small amount of experience with that.

LABEL: 0x2B05
STRING: It was not that I had directly pointed that out...

LABEL: 0x2B43
STRING: ――But.

LABEL: 0x2B5D
STRING: The words I spat out had visibly clouded Reiri's face.

LABEL: 0x2C05
STRING: 「Manipulation, huh...」

LABEL: 0x2C27
STRING: 「You say some pretty interesting things, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x2C51
STRING: 「...Those who don't know anything are happy.」

LABEL: 0x2CA0
STRING: Reiri stared into space.

LABEL: 0x2CC0
STRING: I was taken aback by the glimpse of the expression she showed.

LABEL: 0x2CF0
STRING: A moment later, however, her original sarcastic smile returned to her face.

LABEL: 0x2DA0
STRING: 「This nonsense is over.」

LABEL: 0x2DC0
STRING: 「Let's go to the lab. There's no room for choice.」

LABEL: 0x2DF7
STRING: 「...If you think you can just make everything go the way you want――」

LABEL: 0x2E40
STRING: 「If you think you can return to the others, by all means.」

LABEL: 0x2E76
STRING: 「But will you be able to face Touri, my cute sister, as things are now?」

LABEL: 0x2EC5
STRING: As things were――

LABEL: 0x2EE1
STRING: I thought back to my own wrongdoings, to the truth of what was happening right now.

LABEL: 0x2F2D
STRING: It wasn't Reiri or me who would be hurt by it. It would be the innocent Touri.

LABEL: 0x2F87
STRING: Did she mean to use her own sister as a hostage...?

LABEL: 0x2FB5
STRING: Reiri had an obstinate smile on her face.

LABEL: 0x2FED
STRING: ――Just the worst.

LABEL: 0x3007
STRING: Reiri, as well as me...

LABEL: 0x3029
STRING: 「...All right. To the lab, then.」

LABEL: 0x3059
STRING: 「Just tell me one thing.」

LABEL: 0x3087
STRING: 「The jamming from before... That was your doing, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x30BD
STRING: 「Why did you do that?」

LABEL: 0x30E7
STRING: 「What reason could you have――?」

LABEL: 0x3107
STRING: Reiri began to slowly descend the spiral staircase again as I asked her.

LABEL: 0x3157
STRING: Her steps were as weak as ever, but she didn't seem the least bit hesitant.

LABEL: 0x3207
STRING: 「Hey, are you listening, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x323A
STRING: 「For what reason were you trying to contact the surface, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x327B
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0x3297
STRING: The reason I hesitated wasn't because I lacked confidence in my answer.

LABEL: 0x32CB
STRING: "For what," she asked?

LABEL: 0x32E5
STRING: Wasn't that obvious?

LABEL: 0x397D
STRING: 「To make it out alive.」

LABEL: 0x399D
STRING: 「All of us.」

LABEL: 0x39B9
STRING: I answered vigorously.

LABEL: 0x39EA
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x3A07
STRING: Reiri's reaction was far too subdued.

LABEL: 0x3A3B
STRING: She simply nodded and answered in a flat tone, devoid of any emotion.

LABEL: 0x3A6D
STRING: Was she trying to tell me something?

LABEL: 0x3AB3
STRING: I didn't understand it, whatever it was.

LABEL: 0x3AF7
STRING: A hazy and suffocating feeling filled the air.

LABEL: 0x3B84
STRING: Eventually, Reiri whispered something in a hoarse voice.

LABEL: 0x3BBF
STRING: 「Ignorance――」

LABEL: 0x3BD9
STRING: 「Ignorance is a terrifying thing.」

LABEL: 0x3C08
STRING: She spoke in an indifferent tone without slowing down.

LABEL: 0x3C3E
STRING: Ignorance――

LABEL: 0x3C54
STRING: Was she talking about me?

LABEL: 0x3C7C
STRING: Was she saying there was something I didn't know?

LABEL: 0x3CA2
STRING: What was she trying to say?

LABEL: 0x3D36
STRING: 「You can't blame someone for not having knowledge.」

LABEL: 0x3D86
STRING: 「You won't get anything out of it. It's a waste of time.」

LABEL: 0x3DBE
STRING: 「No matter how hard you try, there are things you can't know.」

LABEL: 0x3E06
STRING: 「Who could be punished for a crime like that?」

LABEL: 0x3ED5
STRING: 「Was whoever sent their friend a boarding pass for the Titanic a criminal?」

LABEL: 0x3F1F
STRING: 「"I could've prevented it if I'd known." "Why didn't I know?"」

LABEL: 0x3F5F
STRING: 「They must've regretted their actions and ignorance.」

LABEL: 0x3FA1
STRING: 「But... is there anyone who can blame them in the same way they blame themselves?」

LABEL: 0x3FE1
STRING: 「Is there anyone who could judge their ignorance?」

LABEL: 0x4018
STRING: ――A truth of the future.

LABEL: 0x4036
STRING: You couldn't call that "knowledge."

LABEL: 0x4060
STRING: Since no one could know it, it was the same as if such a thing didn't exist.

LABEL: 0x40D1
STRING: 「If that's the case... then isn't ignorance a sin?」

LABEL: 0x4108
STRING: Her footsteps stopped.

LABEL: 0x4124
STRING: We were in front of the research room.

LABEL: 0x413E
STRING: And inside... was the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x416F
STRING: 「Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x418A
STRING: Reiri urged me on quietly.

LABEL: 0x41AE
STRING: Standing in front of the door, I hesitated even more.

LABEL: 0x41E2
STRING: I looked at her again.

LABEL: 0x425F
STRING: She stared at me in amusement as I hesitated.

LABEL: 0x428D
STRING: ...As I thought, I had no idea what she was thinking.

LABEL: 0x42CD
STRING: I had obeyed her so far because of how things had turned out, but was it really okay for me to do as she said?

LABEL: 0x432B
STRING: 「Let me confirm one thing.」

LABEL: 0x434B
STRING: Reiri seemed to have no intention of answering what her objective was.

LABEL: 0x4391
STRING: So...

LABEL: 0x43A7
STRING: 「Are your interests the same as ours?」

LABEL: 0x43DF
STRING: 「If what you're doing ends up hurting any one of us...」

LABEL: 0x4437
STRING: 「Then I can't help you.」

LABEL: 0x4463
STRING: They were words to keep her in check.

LABEL: 0x447D
STRING: A clear preemptive strike.

LABEL: 0x4499
STRING: Without scrutinizing the line I drew, Reiri quickly returned my gaze.

LABEL: 0x4557
STRING: 「My wish is to leave this place alive.」

LABEL: 0x458B
STRING: 「Do you think I can do that on my own?」

LABEL: 0x4649
STRING: 「That should be enough.」

LABEL: 0x46A4
STRING: As soon as I held up my keycard, a light sound indicated that the door had unlocked.

LABEL: 0x4786
STRING: We passed through the door to the research room.

LABEL: 0x47A8
STRING: We headed straight for the laboratory that was further inside.

LABEL: 0x47DE
STRING: I held the keycard up again, and the lock released in the blink of an eye.

LABEL: 0x4899
STRING: The laboratory...

LABEL: 0x48B3
STRING: This was the second time I'd been here, but really, this facility didn't suit a cruise ship at all.

LABEL: 0x48FF
STRING: As for the anti-disaster functions, there were clearly more here than in the guest room area.

LABEL: 0x494D
STRING: Even though the rear section was almost entirely submerged after being hit by such an impact,

LABEL: 0x4971
STRING: it looked like there was next to no damage here,

LABEL: 0x49AD
STRING: aside from the fact that the positions of the objects were slightly off.

LABEL: 0x49F7
STRING: Was there something here that had to be protected that badly?

LABEL: 0x4A3B
STRING: Looking around the room, I had no idea what it could be.

LABEL: 0x4A6F
STRING: The room was filled with chemicals I'd never heard of that were outside of my area of expertise, as well as equipment I didn't know how to use.

LABEL: 0x4AC7
STRING: I suddenly realized that I was unconsciously sticking to the wall.

LABEL: 0x4B0F
STRING: Even though my specialization was in a different field, it was only natural... No.

LABEL: 0x4B4B
STRING: Anyone could tell that they shouldn't touch anything here lightly.

LABEL: 0x4B99
STRING: My reaction was probably a normal one.

LABEL: 0x4BC5
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x4C3A
STRING: The first place she headed to was a platform near the center of the room.

LABEL: 0x4C82
STRING: With a glance, she spun around on the spot and headed for a specific shelf without hesitating.

LABEL: 0x4CFA
STRING: Reiri immediately began rummaging around.

LABEL: 0x4D1E
STRING: Showing no hesitation, she opened the glass door and looked down at the many rows of laboratory dishes and test tube labels.

LABEL: 0x4D86
STRING: Talk about acting like you own the place...

LABEL: 0x4DB8
STRING: Eventually, Reiri picked up one of the test tubes.

LABEL: 0x4E5B
STRING: 「Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x4E76
STRING: A whispering voice.

LABEL: 0x4E9B
STRING: 「Let's hold a quiz.」

LABEL: 0x4EC0
STRING: I was about to ask, "Why?"

LABEL: 0x4EDC
STRING: However, I didn't have time to voice my question.

LABEL: 0x4F06
STRING: The liquid inside the examiner began to spin.

LABEL: 0x4F3F
STRING: 「There's a room with a single lever.」

LABEL: 0x4F72
STRING: 「If you pull the lever, you have a random chance of getting food.」

LABEL: 0x4FC4
STRING: 「A rat and a human were put in rooms like that and were allowed to pull this lever.」

LABEL: 0x5012
STRING: 「The rules were simple; the one who got more food in the designated time was the winner.」

LABEL: 0x506C
STRING: 「Now then, who do you think won?」

LABEL: 0x509F
STRING: 「Of course that'd be...」

LABEL: 0x512B
STRING: 「Naturally, the human obtained more food...」

LABEL: 0x5161
STRING: 「I know that's what you want to say.」

LABEL: 0x5189
STRING: 「But actually, it was the rat.」

LABEL: 0x51D7
STRING: 「Now then, Katagiri...」

LABEL: 0x51F3
STRING: 「Do you know why a human lost to a rat?」

LABEL: 0x52B8
STRING: 「The reason why a smart human lost to a cerebellum-driven rat――」

LABEL: 0x5308
STRING: 「Was because humans are "smart."」

LABEL: 0x5336
STRING: 「The human searched for regularity.」

LABEL: 0x535C
STRING: 「Under what conditions did the food come out...?」

LABEL: 0x5398
STRING: 「They would often stop to think,」

LABEL: 0x53BE
STRING: 「build a theory,」

LABEL: 0x53DE
STRING: 「and pull the lever for verification.」

LABEL: 0x540A
STRING: 「They couldn't do something as ridiculous as pull the lever nonstop.」

LABEL: 0x545E
STRING: 「And, they lost.」

LABEL: 0x5507
STRING: 「There was no regularity.」

LABEL: 0x5535
STRING: 「The fact that they didn't know that was the cause of their defeat.」

LABEL: 0x556D
STRING: 「While the human thought, the rat simply kept pulling the lever.」

LABEL: 0x55B5
STRING: 「With no basis, efficiency, or evidence to its actions, completely clumsily and laughably――」

LABEL: 0x5684
STRING: 「That was the "ideal solution" for this task.」

LABEL: 0x56E3
STRING: Not forming a strategy was the optimal method.

LABEL: 0x570D
STRING: The correct course of action was not to grasp an invisible future.

LABEL: 0x573F
STRING: Recklessly,

LABEL: 0x5757
STRING: blindly,

LABEL: 0x576F
STRING: waiting for the time to come,

LABEL: 0x5793
STRING: as if clinging to God.

LABEL: 0x57BD
STRING: Ceasing to think as a form of adaptation.

LABEL: 0x584B
STRING: 「Do you understand, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x5870
STRING: The surface of the tilted test tube froze.

LABEL: 0x58A7
STRING: 「You shouldn't overestimate human intelligence.」

LABEL: 0x58E6
STRING: It was useless.

LABEL: 0x58FE
STRING: There was no point.

LABEL: 0x591E
STRING: What we could do was no different from the rat.

LABEL: 0x5952
STRING: Reiri's words mocked us from behind our backs as we searched for a way to safely return to the surface.

LABEL: 0x59D2
STRING: ...You bastard.

LABEL: 0x59F0
STRING: 「While saying that knowing nothing is a sin...」

LABEL: 0x5A24
STRING: 「Are you saying it's foolish to try and learn things you don't know?」

LABEL: 0x5A6A
STRING: 「What are you getting at, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x5B04
STRING: 「Thou shalt know thy ignorance.」

LABEL: 0x5B85
STRING: 「Beyond that... is the truth.」

LABEL: 0x5BCC
STRING: Reiri turned her back to me as if to say, "I have nothing more to say to you."

LABEL: 0x5CDB
STRING: 「Can you leave me alone for a little bit?」

LABEL: 0x5D06
STRING: Before long, Reiri finished rummaging through all the shelves in the lab.

LABEL: 0x5D46
STRING: She said she wanted to come here, but she hadn't really done anything. Strange...

LABEL: 0x5DA4
STRING: I see. So she didn't want to reveal her hand.

LABEL: 0x5DE0
STRING: I answered her without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x5E67
STRING: 「I can't do that.」

LABEL: 0x5E8B
STRING: 「You're going to run away again, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x5F23
STRING: 「There's no need to worry about that.」

LABEL: 0x5F47
STRING: 「I won't run or hide anymore.」

LABEL: 0x5F6F
STRING: 「Just give me a little time.」

LABEL: 0x5FA0
STRING: 「I told you, I can't.」

LABEL: 0x6027
STRING: My answer was immediate.

LABEL: 0x603D
STRING: It was only natural.

LABEL: 0x6053
STRING: And in response, she...

LABEL: 0x60E5
STRING: 「Two hours.」

LABEL: 0x60FC
STRING: 「I promise to meet you in two hours.」

LABEL: 0x6134
STRING: 「...There's no way I can give you that long.」

LABEL: 0x615F
STRING: It might be fine if it was five minutes, but...

LABEL: 0x6196
STRING: The clock on the wall indicated it was already just before 14:00.

LABEL: 0x61C6
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, there was no time to leave Reiri alone for two hours.

LABEL: 0x6222
STRING: 「You can tell my sister that I'm resting in your room.」

LABEL: 0x6269
STRING: 「As if such an excuse would work.」

LABEL: 0x6291
STRING: 「We're already wasting precious time here.」

LABEL: 0x6341
STRING: 「I'll make it work.」

LABEL: 0x636A
STRING: 「I can't.」

LABEL: 0x638A
STRING: 「First of all, if someone attacked you again...」

LABEL: 0x63BA
STRING: I suddenly remembered something.

LABEL: 0x63D8
STRING: 「...Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x6401
STRING: 「What――

LABEL: 0x6430
STRING: Whoa?!」

LABEL: 0x644D
STRING: I pulled Reiri's slender body toward me.

LABEL: 0x6477
STRING: Her lightness was convenient at times like these.

LABEL: 0x651B
STRING: 「Stop... it!」

LABEL: 0x6542
STRING: Her small hands offered no obstacle at all.

LABEL: 0x657C
STRING: I brushed back her hair, which wasn't well maintained for a high school girl, and looked at the pale nape of her neck.

LABEL: 0x65E0
STRING: There was a faint dark-red mark.

LABEL: 0x660E
STRING: ...It looked tragic.

LABEL: 0x662A
STRING: And, the moment I loosened my grip,

LABEL: 0x66AB
STRING: Reiri's fist slammed%Nstraight into the top of my head.

LABEL: 0x66D3
STRING: 「Ow!」

LABEL: 0x6757
STRING: 「Enough already...」

LABEL: 0x67D4
STRING: 「Let me go!」

LABEL: 0x680B
STRING: She forcibly pulled herself away from me.

LABEL: 0x6837
STRING: Reiri glared at me, her breathing ragged.

LABEL: 0x68D1
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x68F6
STRING: 「...Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x697C
STRING: 「What is it, you swine?」

LABEL: 0x69A7
STRING: 「――Who attacked you last night?」

LABEL: 0x69EF
STRING: Reiri opened her eyes wide.

LABEL: 0x6A7F
STRING: 「Attacked...?」

LABEL: 0x6AA3
STRING: 「What are you talking about, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0x6AD2
STRING: 「You don't remember?」

LABEL: 0x6AF4
STRING: 「Yesterday, you were strangled――」

LABEL: 0x6B8A
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x6BA9
STRING: She answered immediately.

LABEL: 0x6BCB
STRING: The plain tone of her voice, neither mocking nor belittling, gave no indication of her feelings.

LABEL: 0x6CB6
STRING: She was supposed to have been lying in the emergency room, but had disappeared.

LABEL: 0x6CF0
STRING: Afterward, we'd found her strangled in the hallway.

LABEL: 0x6D22
STRING: In the pouring rain under the sprinklers...

LABEL: 0x6D52
STRING: Just who the hell had attacked her?

LABEL: 0x6DF0
STRING: 「This is important.」

LABEL: 0x6E12
STRING: 「Anything at all is fine.」

LABEL: 0x6E3E
STRING: 「Don't you remember anything about last night?」

LABEL: 0x6EE0
STRING: 「I don't know what to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x6F04
STRING: 「Sorry, but I don't have a clue about any strangling or anything like that.」

LABEL: 0x6F4F
STRING: Reiri repeated herself expressionlessly.

LABEL: 0x6F77
STRING: Was she not going to tell me anything at all?

LABEL: 0x6FAB
STRING: There was no way she knew nothing.

LABEL: 0x6FF1
STRING: After all, she was directly involved.

LABEL: 0x7013
STRING: Even if she didn't know anything about the culprit...

LABEL: 0x704F
STRING: At the very least, she should know what happened last night better than us.

LABEL: 0x70B5
STRING: However, she seemed far too defenseless to be hiding something.

LABEL: 0x70F1
STRING: She should be able to avoid questioning using a deception that was less out of place than this.

LABEL: 0x7149
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x71BC
STRING: I just had a feeling that Reiri was hiding... something.

LABEL: 0x71EE
STRING: All she did was hide things from us.

LABEL: 0x721C
STRING: Our interests may be aligned for the time being, but there was not a shred of trust between us.

LABEL: 0x7270
STRING: That was to be expected.

LABEL: 0x728E
STRING: Somehow, Reiri knew what I had done and who I was.

LABEL: 0x72E4
STRING: There was no way that she would trust me knowing all that.

LABEL: 0x7350
STRING: If that was the case, at least――

LABEL: 0x7370
STRING: 「Okay, okay...」

LABEL: 0x738A
STRING: 「I believe you, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x73AC
STRING: 「You can stay here if you want to. However...」

LABEL: 0x73E4
STRING: I pointed to the sliding door behind me.

LABEL: 0x7412
STRING: 「This lab is set up so you can't go outside without a master key.」

LABEL: 0x7464
STRING: 「In other words, unless I open it from the outside, you'll be trapped here.」

LABEL: 0x74BA
STRING: 「You don't mind that?」

LABEL: 0x754A
STRING: 「That's fine.」

LABEL: 0x7566
STRING: 「I won't run or hide. Even I keep my promises.」

LABEL: 0x75AB
STRING: Well, there was no way to access the system from here.

LABEL: 0x7603
STRING: That being the case, wouldn't it be fine to grant her this one wish?

LABEL: 0x7671
STRING: 「Okay, I'll be back in two hours.」

LABEL: 0x769E
STRING: I turned to leave.

LABEL: 0x76C5
STRING: 「Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x76E0
STRING: I heard a voice from behind me.

LABEL: 0x7711
STRING: 「Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x778F
STRING: I headed to the others waiting for us on the third floor.
